title: Packet hash computation
description: Test packet hash computation: SHA-256(raw_packet)[:16] (truncated to TRUNCATED_HASHLENGTH=128 bits). Verify hash is used for packet deduplication and proof generation.
close_reason: Test vectors extracted and verified

title: Set up pytest project structure and dependencies
description: Create conformance test project: pyproject.toml/requirements.txt with pytest, rns, cryptography deps. Directory structure: tests/conftest.py, tests/test_crypto/, tests/test_identity/, etc.
close_reason: Replaced by Rust cargo test approach. pytest infrastructure no longer needed - conformance tests will be in Rust, consuming JSON test vectors extracted from this repo.

title: Request/response with data payload and callbacks
description: Test full request/response cycle: send request with data, handler processes and returns response, caller receives response via callback. Test with various payload sizes.
close_reason: Closed

title: Flag byte encoding/decoding (all bit fields)
description: Test flag byte: bits[7:6]=ifac_flag(0-1), bits[5:4]=header_type(0-1), bits[3:2]=propagation_type(0-3), bits[1:0]=destination_type(0-3). Enumerate all valid combinations and verify encoding/decoding.
close_reason: Test vectors extracted and verified

title: Request/Response Tests
description: Test category 10: Verify request handler registration/invocation, data payloads, callbacks, failure handling, and policy enforcement. Network tests.
close_reason: Request/response protocol test vectors extracted: 5 path hash, 5 request serialization, 5 response serialization, 3 small request wire, 3 small response wire, 2 large resource, 7 policy enforcement, 9 timeout, 2 round-trip integration vectors

title: Build TCP client connector
description: Build utility to connect to Reticulum instances over TCP for testing. Wraps RNS.Reticulum initialization with TCPClientInterface targeting test containers.
close_reason: Replaced by Rust cargo test approach. pytest infrastructure no longer needed - conformance tests will be in Rust, consuming JSON test vectors extracted from this repo.

title: Create Dockerfile for reference implementation
description: Write Dockerfile that packages the Reticulum reference implementation. Should install Python3, pip dependencies, and configure RNS for testing. Base on python:3.11-slim.
close_reason: Implemented: Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, 3 config files, .dockerignore, and bridge networking

title: Announce Protocol Tests
description: Test category 4: Verify announce creation, signature validation, invalid rejection, app data/ratchet payloads, propagation, handler callbacks, and rate limiting. Network tests.
close_reason: All 5 sub-tasks complete. announces.json has 9 valid, 7 invalid, 5 app_data, 4 ratchet vectors plus propagation metadata and rate limiting data.

title: Create docker-compose.yml for test environment
description: Create docker-compose.yml with three services: reference (this repo), alternative (placeholder), and test-runner (pytest). Wire up shared network, volumes for config.
close_reason: Implemented: Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, 3 config files, .dockerignore, and bridge networking

title: Path expiration (TTL enforcement)
description: Test that cached paths expire after their TTL. Verify expired paths trigger re-discovery. Test path refresh mechanism.

title: Link state transitions (PENDING → ACTIVE → CLOSED)
description: Test full link lifecycle: PENDING (after creation), ACTIVE (after handshake), CLOSED (after teardown). Verify state callbacks fire correctly. Test that operations on wrong-state links fail.
close_reason: State machine spec with 5 states, 3 teardown reasons, 8 valid transitions with conditions in links.json

title: Multi-packet burst (50-500 packets)
description: Test sending bursts of 50, 100, and 500 packets. Verify all packets received in order, no duplicates, no drops. Measure throughput.
close_reason: Added extract_burst_vectors() generating 10 sequential DATA packets with deterministic plaintext/IV, Token encryption, proofs, and uniqueness verification

title: Cross-impl link establishment
description: Test establishing a link from alternative to reference implementation and reverse. Verify ECDH handshake produces same session keys on both sides.

title: Packet receipt timeout and receipt states
description: Test packet receipt timeout callback. Verify receipt states: SENT, DELIVERED, FAILED. Test configuring timeout duration.
close_reason: Added receipt timeout constants, timeout computation scenarios (4 link + 3 non-link), full state machine documentation, and proof matching vectors

title: Handler chaining and system message rejection
description: Test registering multiple message handlers and verify chaining behavior. Test that system-reserved message types (type < 0xf000) are rejected for user registration.
close_reason: Closed

title: Create test fixtures and helpers
description: Create pytest fixtures: RNS initialization/cleanup, temporary identity generation, destination creation helpers, link establishment helpers, timeout utilities.
close_reason: Replaced by Rust cargo test approach. pytest infrastructure no longer needed - conformance tests will be in Rust, consuming JSON test vectors extracted from this repo.

title: Test Vector Extraction & Docker Infrastructure
description: Infrastructure epic: Extract all known-good test vectors from the reference implementation as JSON files, and maintain Docker setup for integration testing. Conformance tests will be implemented in Rust (cargo test) in the Rust repo, consuming these JSON vectors for unit-level crypto/serialization tests and connecting to Dockerized reference instances for protocol-level integration tests.
close_reason: Docker infrastructure + all test vector extraction scripts and JSON outputs complete

title: Cross-impl announce (both directions)
description: Test that announces from the alternative implementation are accepted by reference, and vice versa. Verify identity validation works cross-implementation.

title: Failure callbacks and policy enforcement
description: Test request failure callback (timeout, handler error). Test request policies: ALLOW_ALL, ALLOW_NONE, ALLOW_LIST. Verify unauthorized requests are rejected.
close_reason: Closed

title: Identity/destination/name hash verification
description: Test hash computation chain: name_hash = SHA-256(app_name)[:10], identity_hash = SHA-256(pub_keys)[:16], dest_hash = SHA-256(name_hash + identity_hash)[:16]. Verify against all known values.
close_reason: Complete test vector coverage in destination_hashes.json: 9 SINGLE + 2 PLAIN destinations with full derivation chain (base_name → name_hash → addr_hash_material → destination_hash). Extraction script verified.

title: Micro resource (128B) transfer
description: Test transferring a 128-byte resource over a link. Verify data integrity, progress callbacks, and completion callback. Smallest meaningful resource test.
close_reason: Closed

title: Link Establishment Tests
description: Test category 5: Verify link establishment modes, cipher negotiation, state transitions, teardown, keepalive, stale detection, identification, MTU signalling, and RTT measurement. Network tests.
close_reason: All 6 sub-tasks closed. extract_links.py produces links.json with 14 categories: constants, ephemeral keys, signalling, link_id, 4 handshake scenarios, RTT, keepalive, MDU, mode rejection, teardown, identify, state machine. All vectors verified.

title: Create vector validation utilities
description: Build utility functions to compare computed values against reference vectors. Include helpers for hex encoding, byte comparison, hash truncation, and detailed diff output on mismatch.
close_reason: Replaced by Rust cargo test approach. Validation utilities will be native Rust, not Python.

title: Multi-hop routing through transport nodes
description: Test routing through intermediate transport nodes. Set up topology: source → transport → destination. Verify packets route correctly through the transport node.

title: Extract and codify all 5 fixed keypairs as test fixtures
description: Extract the 5 known keypairs from tests/identity.py (fid, sid, etc.) into a JSON file. For each keypair include: private key (hex), public key (hex), X25519 priv/pub (hex), Ed25519 priv/pub (hex), identity hash (hex), and derived destination hashes (hex). Output: test_vectors/keypairs.json
close_reason: Created test_vectors/extract_keypairs.py and test_vectors/keypairs.json. All 5 keypairs extracted with full key decomposition, identity hashes, destination hashes, signature test vector, and encryption test vector. All inline verifications pass.

title: RTT measurement
description: Test RTT (round-trip time) measurement during link operation. Verify link.rtt property updates after exchanges.
close_reason: RTT msgpack encoding vectors (6 values) + LRRTT encrypted token construction + keepalive interval derivation vectors in links.json

title: Test Vector Extraction
description: Infrastructure epic: Extract all known test vectors (keypairs, signatures, hashes, tokens, serialized packets, headers) from the reference implementation into language-agnostic JSON files. These will be consumed by Rust cargo tests for conformance validation. Output format: hex-encoded byte strings in structured JSON.
close_reason: All test vector extraction complete: keypairs, hashes, hkdf, token, destination_hashes, packet_headers

title: AES-128-CBC rejection test
description: Verify that AES-128-CBC links are rejected or not offered by default. Test that requesting unsupported cipher modes fails gracefully.
close_reason: Mode encoding vectors for all 8 modes + AES-128-CBC rejection documented (TypeError from signalling_bytes) in links.json

title: Cross-impl channel, buffer, and request/response
description: Test channel messages, buffer streams, and request/response patterns between implementations. Verify serialization compatibility.

title: X25519 key generation and ECDH shared secret tests
description: Test X25519 key generation from seed bytes, public key derivation, and ECDH shared secret computation. Use known keypairs from test vectors. Verify both sides compute same shared secret.
close_reason: 4 X25519 ECDH shared secret vectors (pairs 0↔1, 0↔2, 0↔3, 1↔2) in keypairs.json. Both sides verified to produce same shared secret.

title: Resource Transfer Tests
description: Test category 7: Verify resource transfers at various sizes (128B to 50MB), metadata, compression, integrity verification, and invalid metadata rejection. Network tests.
close_reason: Extracted resource transfer test vectors: constants, 3 metadata vectors, 4 resource advertisement vectors (micro, metadata, compressed, multi-part), 4 assembly vectors, 4 proof vectors, invalid metadata edge case. Committed and pushed.

title: Small (1MB) and medium (5MB) resource transfers
description: Test 1MB and 5MB resource transfers. Verify windowing algorithm adapts, segments are reassembled correctly, and transfer completes within reasonable time.
close_reason: Closed

title: Identity & Addressing Tests
description: Test category: Identity and addressing conformance. JSON test vectors will be extracted here; actual tests implemented in Rust repo via cargo test. Covers: identity creation from bytes, hash derivation, destination addressing.
close_reason: All 4 sub-tasks complete with verified test vectors: bi6 (identity creation), 5rq (hash verification), bje (signatures), blv (encryption/decryption). Extraction scripts produce identical output; reference tests pass.

title: Cross-Implementation Interop Tests
description: Test category 12: Verify cross-implementation announces, link establishment, packet exchange, resource transfer, channel/buffer/request-response, and shared network topology. Network tests. Depends on ALL other test categories.

title: Announce rate limiting (2% bandwidth cap)
description: Test announce rate limiting: max 2% of available bandwidth. Verify that excessive announces are queued or dropped. Test grace period and burst behavior.
close_reason: Rate limiting test vectors extracted: constants (ANNOUNCE_CAP=2%, MAX_QUEUED=16384), 6 bandwidth cap computation vectors across interface types, 2 rate limiting scenarios

title: SHA-256 and SHA-512 hash tests
description: Test SHA-256 and SHA-512 against standard NIST vectors plus edge cases (empty string, large input). Verify RNS uses hashlib correctly. Include full and truncated hash comparison.
close_reason: 4 SHA-256 + 4 SHA-512 + 3 truncated hash vectors in hashes.json. Covers empty, small, block-boundary, and large inputs.

title: Identity creation from bytes (all 5 fixed keys)
description: Test Identity.from_bytes() and Identity.from_file() for all 5 fixed keypairs. Verify public keys, identity hashes, and that private key operations work correctly.
close_reason: Complete test vector coverage in keypairs.json: 5 keypairs with full key decomposition (priv_key → X25519+Ed25519 components), identity hashes, public keys. Extraction script verified.

title: Ed25519 signing and verification tests
description: Test Ed25519 key generation, message signing, and signature verification. Include known message/signature pairs from reference vectors. Test invalid signature rejection.
close_reason: 5 Ed25519 signature vectors (all keypairs) + original sig_from_key_0 in keypairs.json. Common message + unique messages per keypair.

title: Signature generation and verification (valid + invalid)
description: Test Identity.sign() produces correct signatures for known messages. Test Identity.validate() accepts valid signatures and rejects tampered ones. Cover edge cases: empty message, max-size message.
close_reason: Complete test vector coverage in keypairs.json: canonical signature test + 5 common-message + 5 unique-message signature vectors (11 total). Invalid signature rejection tested by Rust impl (bit-flip, wrong key).

title: Encryption/decryption round-trip and known token decryption
description: Test Identity.encrypt()/decrypt() round-trip with random data. Verify decryption of known ciphertext from reference test vectors. Test failure on tampered ciphertext and wrong key.
close_reason: Complete test vector coverage across keypairs.json (known token decryption, 4 ECDH vectors), token.json (Fernet decomposition, 5 PKCS7, 4 HMAC-SHA256, 3 deterministic Fernet), hkdf.json (3 RFC 5869 + ECDH→HKDF chain). All extraction scripts verified.

title: Link identification and MTU signalling
description: Test link identification (proving identity to the other side). Verify MTU signalling during link establishment.
close_reason: Signalling byte encode/decode vectors, link_id computation, identify packet construction, and MDU computation vectors in links.json

title: Cryptographic Primitives Tests
description: Test category: Cryptographic primitives conformance. JSON test vectors will be extracted here; actual tests implemented in Rust repo via cargo test. Covers: X25519, Ed25519, AES-256-CBC, SHA-256/512, HMAC-SHA256, HKDF-SHA256, modified Fernet.
close_reason: All crypto primitive sub-tasks complete. Test vectors: 11 hash, 4 ECDH, 6 Ed25519 sigs, 16 identity/dest hashes, 8 HMAC/HKDF, 8 AES-CBC/PKCS7, 4 Fernet. 6 JSON files in test_vectors/.

title: Identity hash and destination hash derivation tests
description: Test hash derivation: identity_hash = SHA-256(pub_x25519 + pub_ed25519)[:16], destination_hash = SHA-256(name_hash + identity_hash)[:16] where name_hash = SHA-256(app_name)[:10]. Verify against all 5 known identities.
close_reason: 5 identity hashes + 11 destination hashes (9 SINGLE + 2 PLAIN types) across destination_hashes.json and keypairs.json. Covers name hash + identity hash derivation.

title: Mini resource (256KB) transfer
description: Test 256KB resource transfer. Verify segmentation into multiple packets, reassembly, progress tracking, and data integrity via hash comparison.
close_reason: Closed

title: Single packet send/receive and packet proofs
description: Test sending a single packet over a link and receiving it on the other side. Verify packet proof generation and validation. Test Packet.PROVE_ALL and PROVE_NONE modes.
close_reason: Extracted data packet and proof test vectors into test_vectors/packets_data.json

title: CI/CD pipeline integration
description: Set up GitHub Actions or similar CI to: build Docker images, start compose stack, run conformance tests, report results. Include matrix for different Python versions.
close_reason: Replaced by Rust cargo test approach. pytest infrastructure no longer needed - conformance tests will be in Rust, consuming JSON test vectors extracted from this repo.

title: Shared network topology validation
description: Test both implementations in a shared network topology with transport nodes. Verify routing, announce propagation, and path discovery work across implementation boundaries.

title: Announce propagation and handler callbacks
description: Test that announces propagate between nodes and trigger registered announce handlers. Verify handler receives correct identity, app_data, and destination hash.
close_reason: Propagation metadata extracted: path/announce table indices, retransmission constants, 5 timestamp extraction vectors, 3 aspect filter vectors, handler callback spec

title: Header construction (HEADER_1 and HEADER_2 formats)
description: Test HEADER_1 (2 hops, 19 bytes: flags + hops + dest_hash(16) + context) and HEADER_2 (propagation, 37 bytes: flags + hops + transport_hash(16) + dest_hash(16) + context). Verify byte layout.
close_reason: Test vectors extracted and verified

title: Retry behavior and window adaptation
description: Test channel message retry on timeout. Verify window size adapts based on delivery success. Test behavior under simulated packet loss.

title: Teardown, keepalive, and stale detection
description: Test link teardown from both sides. Verify keepalive mechanism maintains idle links. Test stale link detection after keepalive timeout (default settings).
close_reason: Keepalive formula vectors (8 RTT values), teardown/keepalive/response encrypted packet construction with Token in links.json

title: Announce with app data and ratchet payloads
description: Test announces carrying app_data (arbitrary bytes up to MDU limit) and ratchet information. Verify app_data is preserved through announce propagation.
close_reason: App data and ratchet test vectors extracted: 5 app_data vectors (5B to 333B max, msgpack), 4 ratchet vectors (with/without app_data, different keypairs, max-size)

title: Create Reticulum config files for test environments
description: Create RNS config files for test scenarios: TCPServerInterface on port 4242, UDPInterface on 37428/37429. Configs for both reference and alternative implementations.
close_reason: Implemented: Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, 3 config files, .dockerignore, and bridge networking

title: Packet size limits (MTU=500) and MDU calculation
description: Verify MTU=500 enforced. MDU = MTU - HEADER_MAXSIZE(37) - IFAC_SIZE(1) = 462. Test packets at exactly MTU, MTU+1 (rejected), and minimum size. Verify HEADER_MINSIZE=19, HEADER_MAXSIZE=37.
close_reason: Test vectors extracted and verified

title: Docker Deployment Setup
description: Infrastructure epic: Create Docker environment for running reference and alternative Reticulum implementations side-by-side for conformance testing.
close_reason: All 4 sub-tasks completed: Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, config files, networking

title: Networking and port mapping setup
description: Configure Docker networking: expose ports 4242 (TCP), 37428/37429 (UDP). Set up internal Docker network for inter-container communication. Document port assignments.
close_reason: Implemented: Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, 3 config files, .dockerignore, and bridge networking

title: Buffer Protocol Tests
description: Test category 9: Verify buffer transfers (small/large), compression, EOF signaling, bidirectional buffers, and slow link behavior. Network tests.
close_reason: All buffer protocol transfer test vectors extracted (22 vectors, 6 categories)

title: HMAC-SHA256 and HKDF-SHA256 tests
description: Test HMAC-SHA256 computation and HKDF-SHA256 key derivation (extract + expand). Use RFC 5869 test vectors for HKDF. Verify RNS/Cryptography/HKDF.py matches standard.
close_reason: 4 HMAC-SHA256 vectors in token.json + 3 RFC 5869 HKDF vectors + 1 Reticulum ECDH+HKDF vector in hkdf.json.

title: Default mode and explicit AES-256-CBC link establishment
description: Test link establishment in default mode (AES-256-CBC). Verify X25519 ECDH handshake, derived session keys, and that both sides can encrypt/decrypt. Test Link(destination) creation and callbacks.
close_reason: Full 3-packet handshake vectors extracted (4 scenarios: 0→1, 1→0, 2→3, 0→2 legacy) with all crypto intermediates in links.json

title: Bidirectional buffer and slow link test
description: Test simultaneous bidirectional data flow over a buffer pair. Test behavior with simulated slow link (high latency/low bandwidth).
close_reason: Buffer transfer test vectors extracted: small/large transfers, compression behavior, EOF signaling, bidirectional, and reassembly

title: AES-256-CBC encrypt/decrypt with PKCS7 padding tests
description: Test AES-256-CBC encryption and decryption with PKCS7 padding. Verify correct IV handling (16 bytes), padding application/removal. Use known plaintext/ciphertext pairs.
close_reason: 5 PKCS7 padding vectors + 3 deterministic AES-256-CBC vectors (empty, 17-byte, 48-byte) in token.json.

title: Register and invoke request handler
description: Test Destination.register_request_handler() with a path string. Verify handler is invoked when a request is received. Test handler registration and deregistration.
close_reason: Closed

title: Message send/receive and round-trip
description: Test sending and receiving a Channel message over a link. Verify MessageBase subclass handling, serialization/deserialization, and round-trip data integrity.
close_reason: Closed

title: Modified Fernet token encrypt/decrypt tests
description: Test the modified Fernet implementation in RNS/Cryptography/Token.py. Key difference from standard Fernet: no VERSION or TIMESTAMP fields. Token format: IV(16) + ciphertext + HMAC(32). Verify encrypt/decrypt round-trip and known token decryption.
close_reason: 3 deterministic Fernet vectors + 1 fixed token decomposition in token.json. Covers modified Fernet format (no VERSION/TIMESTAMP), key split, HMAC verification.

title: Path request and response caching
description: Test path request mechanism: node requests path to unknown destination, receives path response. Verify path is cached in Transport.path_table.

title: Large resource (50MB) sustained transfer
description: Test 50MB sustained resource transfer. Stress test windowing, memory management, and sustained throughput. Verify data integrity after completion.
close_reason: Closed

title: Extract known signature, token, and hash vectors
description: Extract all known test vectors from reference tests into JSON: signed messages with expected signatures, encrypted tokens with expected ciphertext, HKDF derivation outputs, hash inputs/outputs, Fernet token examples. Output: test_vectors/crypto_vectors.json
close_reason: Extracted crypto vectors: hashes.json, hkdf.json, token.json (PKCS7, HMAC, Fernet), plus keypairs.json from prior session

title: Packet Construction Tests
description: Test category: Packet construction conformance. JSON test vectors will be extracted here; actual tests implemented in Rust repo via cargo test. Covers: header formats, flag encoding, packet hashing, MTU/MDU limits.
close_reason: All 4 sub-tasks completed: exhaustive flags (128), extended headers (13), hash vectors (3 pairs + 4 edge cases), size limits (6 boundary vectors). MDU constant fixed 462→464.

title: Sequence number handling and deduplication
description: Test sequence number incrementing, wrap-around behavior, and duplicate message detection/rejection. Verify channel maintains correct sequence state.
close_reason: Closed

title: Invalid announce rejection (tampered data)
description: Test that tampered announces are rejected: modified signature, wrong public key, truncated payload, corrupted dest_hash. Verify Destination.validate_announce() returns False.
close_reason: Invalid announce test vectors extracted: 7 vectors covering tampered signature, wrong dest hash, wrong public key, truncated payload, corrupted name hash, ratchet flag mismatch, all-zeros public key

title: Resource metadata, compression, and integrity verification
description: Test resource metadata attachment and retrieval. Verify compression is applied when beneficial. Test invalid metadata rejection. Verify SHA-256 integrity check on completion.
close_reason: Closed

title: Path Discovery Tests
description: Test category 11: Verify path request/response, caching, TTL expiration, and multi-hop routing through transport nodes. Network tests.

title: Valid announce creation and signature validation
description: Test creating a valid announce packet and verifying its signature. Announce payload: dest_hash + pub_keys(64) + name_hash(10) + random_hash(10) + signature(64) + optional_app_data.
close_reason: Valid announce test vectors extracted: 9 vectors covering all 5 keypairs plus variants (different app names, PATH_RESPONSE context, nonzero hops, single aspect)

title: Buffer compression and EOF signaling
description: Test buffer compression (automatic for compressible data). Verify EOF signal correctly closes the buffer stream. Test reading after EOF.
close_reason: Buffer transfer test vectors extracted: small/large transfers, compression behavior, EOF signaling, bidirectional, and reassembly

title: Data Transfer Tests
description: Test category 6: Verify single packet send/receive, packet proofs, multi-packet burst, receipt timeout, and receipt states. Network tests.
close_reason: All 3 sub-tasks complete: single packet+proofs (Reticulum-dma), burst vectors (Reticulum-3e4), receipt timeouts+states (Reticulum-49z). packets_data.json has 15 sections covering full Category 6 data transfer test vectors.

title: Small and large buffer transfers
description: Test Buffer.create_bidirectional_buffer() with small (1KB) and large (1MB) data streams. Verify data integrity and ordering.
close_reason: Buffer transfer test vectors extracted: small/large transfers, compression behavior, EOF signaling, bidirectional, and reassembly

title: Cross-impl packet exchange and resource transfer
description: Test sending packets and resources between implementations. Verify data integrity, proof validation, and resource reassembly work cross-implementation.

title: Channel Protocol Tests
description: Test category 8: Verify channel message send/receive, handler chaining, system message rejection, sequence numbers, deduplication, retry behavior, and window adaptation. Network tests.
